ygData.subject: Re: Level 12 Pet
ygData.msgSnippet: every level i spend some time repeatedly casting some of my 1st level spells. takes about 15 mins to max out the skills.  for conj just keep casting disease
ygData.messageBody:
every level i spend some time repeatedly casting some of my 1st level
spells. takes about 15 mins to max out the skills. for conj just keep
casting disease cloud. i cast it on other people, because im non-pvp, but
dead bodies work too. someone told me to cast on my pet, but i havent had a
chance to try it yet. i can see that would be good for evocation tho, but i
usually hunt undead anyway, so i generally dont need to top it off that way.

belphenor


>From: "Michael Wooldirdge" <mike@...>

>people complain but it's been fine for me so far. My conjuration skill is
>however maxed out so that may have something to do with it then again it
>may
>not.
